meanings.sent1: The Colins family had a big reunion last weekend.
meanings.sent2: Mr. Colins is a teacher at our school.
meanings.sent3: Why did the Colins family bring so many snacks to the picnic?
meanings.sent4: The Colins surname is as common as the Smith surname.
meanings.sent5: The Colins name has been passed down for generations.

meanings.definition: Collins - a type of drink made with soda water, sugar, lemon juice, and gin
meanings.sent1: I ordered a refreshing Colins at the bar.
meanings.sent2: The bartender mixed the Colins perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The Colins drink was so sour, it made me pucker.
meanings.sent4: The Colins cocktail sparkled like a gem in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The Colins beverage was a delightful blend of flavors.
